item.title: some usefull link
item.description:
• Richard Sutton - personally find good reads the ‘The Bitter Lesson’ and ‘Mind is About Information’
  • The Alignment Problem - get to know some issues about AI and human values.
  • A Theory of Human Motivation - a small theory on human motivation according Maslow pyramid.

item.title: things to learn
item.description:
i have always wanted to keep learning plenty of things, not only about tech, and i do have a long list of things to learn. But if I had to summarize it to a few points, i think they would be:

  • How can AI be developed to align with human ethics and morals?
  • Economics and its related fields
  • Human evolution and human brain
  • Philosophy
  • Cybersecurity
  • Blockchain/crypto

if you have any helpful articles, videos, recommendations, books, etc., please share them with me thxs.

item.title: me
item.description: i am a cs student at itesm mx. i don’t quite have yet a specific area but i am curious in AI and human moral/ethics, networks, and economics.
